channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A meteor makes an eel gigantic in 'Mighty Pups Stop a Mighty Eel', then in 'Pups Save a Floating Royal Carriage', Sweetie decides to commandeer the Princess's royal carriage and horse.

channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim, Tommy and Tia get lost at a play centre.

channel.desc: Tim and Kai try to photograph the illusive SpaceBug.

channel.desc: Tim tries to make his own Captain DinoStar movie.

channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The pups' wildlife adventure hops away in 'The Crew Builds A Kangaroo Safari', then in 'The Crew Plays In The Construction Games', Speed Meister challenges Rubble & Crew.

channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines

channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Ben Elf and his parents are going on holiday in the elf truck but Gaston the Ladybird has swallowed the car keys.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Holly takes some frogspawn home from class to look after, but is surprised when the frogspawn turns into tadpoles overnight. Soon there are lots of little frogs for Holly to look after.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The children must walk to school in a walking bus! Miss Rabbit wears a high visibility jacket, leading Peppa and friends in a bus formation.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy, Daddy, Peppa and George are going to the seaside. Mummy and Daddy explain clouds to Peppa and George who have a little sing and dance about clouds.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It's Richard Rabbit's birthday party and George is invited, and that can only mean one thing; Soft Play.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy and Daddy Pig, Peppa and George have a wonderful day with Mr. Potato at Digger World.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora gets a birthday surprise in 'Dora's Birthday Surprise', then in 'Moonlight Fiesta', Dora helps La Luna save the Moonlight Fiesta.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Eddie and Emmy cause trouble in 'Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch', and then in 'Pups Save a Lonely Ghost', Rubble dreams that he meets a ghost and tries to help it to make new friends.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and George have been sailing with Granny and Grandpa Pig. Back at the clubhouse, they discover a jukebox - but it is very noisy.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her friends are at playgroup when Mr. Bull arrives to do some noisy work - he is building a windmill, to make electricity! The children join in and make their own windmills too.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It is a lovely, sunny day. Peppa and George have come to the seaside. It's a perfect time for everyone to make sandcastles, with a moat, a bridge, and a visitor.

channel.desc: Grandpa Pig is taking Peppa and George sailing, but they keep getting stuck in the mud.

channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Mr Elf is overworked so King Thistle sentences him to a holiday. He isn't too pleased. But Mrs Elf and Ben are overjoyed! Meanwhile, Nanny takes over the food deliveries.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Lucy and her dad are having a relaxing day boating on the lake. They fish out an old glittery mirror from the bottom of the lake, but it belongs to a mermaid who would like it back.
